title: #652 | CORONAVIRUS SPECIAL! | Dr. Chris Choi Guests | Louder with Crowder
description: Steven talks all things COVID-19 with his own personal physician, Dr. Christopher Choi, American board-certified internist. They discuss everything you at home need to know as we face this pandemic together and the significant differences between how South Korea and the U.S. have dealt with the outbreak. It’s coffee, corona, and Korea in this one.
